item.title: Apache Hop 2.0 is available!!
item.description: After three months of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.0.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.0 brings: Upgrade to Java 11 Chinese translations New transform plugins Apache Avro File Output Apache Doris Bulk Loader Drools Rules Accumulator Drools Rules Executor Formula Apache Beam upgrade Various Variable Annotations Dimension Lookup/Update new dialog Integration tests Community JIRA or download Hop 2.
